subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Mr. Derr reported from the Masters 62 times starting in 1935 and was part of the CBS team that first presented the event on television, in 1956.
snippet: Mr. Derr reported from the Masters 62 times starting in 1935 and was part of the CBS team that first presented the event on television, in 1956.
